QuestData.Title: Kel'vax's Home
QuestData.Description:
Kel'vax's soul be bound ta three phylacteries, protected by his voodoo. Even if ya destroy him, he just be reformin' in dem.
Me old power be returnin' after ya lit dem torches. I be able ta enchant dis powder dat allow ya ta go through Kel'vax's voodoo.
Find dese phylacteries and bring 'em ta me. We gonna look Kel'vax in da eye when we destroy 'em.
I should warn ya... dis powder might be messin' with ya head. Ya may have some... visions after ya use it. Be careful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Shinga Deathwalker's Spirit Powder to take Kel'vax's Ancient, Repaired, and Pristine Phylacteries.
